## Summary
A short description of the feature (e.g. "Install script for Neovim on Ubuntu/Debian").

## Motivation
Why is this useful? What problem does it solve?

## Proposed solution
- Which tool(s) or app(s) should be installed or configured?
- Which distros should be supported (Ubuntu, Debian, Fedora, etc.)?
- Any specific version or installation method (package manager, binary, from source)?

## Alternatives considered
Any other approaches you thought about.

## Additional context
Screenshots, links to upstream docs, or examples from other projects.
